bug.short_desc: could we get option to switch to the old view pleasssseeee ?

1.could we get the old view but with the new version, meaning faster 2.im mostly meaning the fav tabs in the bookmarks tab, i dont want the word bookmarks but its impossible i remove it without all being removed, i wonder why u change to new while not everyone would appreciate it, at least leave an option to switch to old view back plz thx 3.
